availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jeremiah Vardeman “Jerry” Robinson (Jessamine County and Clark County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky Native. Married Jane F. Bush Robinson in Clark County, Kentucky, February 12, 1846. Father of Isabella Vaughn Robinson, Franklin Robinson and Olly B. Robinson. Married to Mary C. Hampton Robinson in Clark County on January 4, 1859. Farmer in Jessamine County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Jessamine County in 1850. Farmer in Clark County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Clark County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, division 1, p. 2B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, Division 1, p. 26.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District 2, p. 807.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District 2, p. 332A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clark County Marriages, Film 001943687, p. 99.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY Roll 994032, Clark County Marriages, p. 61-62.
" Jeremiah Vardeman “Jerry” Robinson (1823-1923)," Find A Grave, Memorial 50607996, accessed April 14, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/50607996.
